snippet.title: EVERING - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
𝐄𝐕𝐄𝐑𝐈𝐍𝐆 is a turn-based RPG that tells an epic story through witty dialogue with charismatic characters. 

Uncover the origin of the mysterious hero and find out something you weren't looking for.

EXPLORE 🧭 
MEET 🤝 
FIGHT ⚔️


𝐄𝐕𝐄𝐑𝐈𝐍𝐆, Available 28th February 2024!


◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟◞◯◟

Buy on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1876340
Buy on itch: https://purpurest.itch.io/evering

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Follow us on Twitter https://twitter.com/PurpureSt_

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music: 
"A Fight in the Fields" by Jonathan Shaw (jshaw.co.uk)
"EVERING Main Theme" by Pingüin Music Studio (twitter.com/pinguin_music)
